Workflow.Name: SetupWizard>CreateGroup
Workflow.Description: This flow is triggered from the setup wizard "configure communication methods" step when a new group is created as part of the configuration. This flow creates a new Azure Active Directory security group, and returns the group ID and email to the setup wizard.
Workflow.BillingContext: [{"id":"admin_CoESetupWizardPreview","type":"UnifiedApp","metadata":{"displayName":"CoE Setup and Upgrade Wizard"}},{"id":"admin_SetupWIzardARMFeatures","type":"UnifiedApp","metadata":{"displayName":"Setup WIzard - ARM Features"}}]

Description.description: This flow is triggered from the setup wizard "configure communication methods" step when a new group is created as part of the configuration. This flow creates a new Azure Active Directory security group, and returns the group ID and email to the setup wizard.
